metadata.description: The famous martial arts folk hero, Wong Fei Hung, teams up with America's greatest spy, Foster Dulles, to find the ancient Staff of the Monkey King before a highly ruthless team of super-ninjas can exploit it and help the Japanese win World War II! Tiger and Crane is a fresh new take on a classic Chinese hero, a kinetic blend of kung-fu comedy with the amazing high adventure of Indiana Jones and the thrilling espionage of James Bond!
metadata.name: Tiger & Crane
